titleStmt.title: A whipp for the animadverter in return to his second libell. By R. L'S.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: A reply to "A second letter unto a person of honour & quality, containing some farther animadversions upon the Bishop of Worcester's letter" both by Edward Bagshaw.
Caption title on p. 3 reads: An ansvver to a libel, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Jesus College Library, Cambridge.
